con:testCase.name: BE11_AM11-InvalidCreditCountryCode_InvalidCurrency
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for BE11-InvalidCreditCountryCode and AM11-InvalidCurrency

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'

select * from STATUSREASON_ADDT_INF where FK_STATUSREASONID in ('${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/STATUSREASONID[1]}','${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/STATUSREASONID[1]}','${STATUS_REASON#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/STATUSREASONID[1]}')
